module.sqlWrap: SELECT TOP(@Top) lv.PassportId,u.Avatar,u.NickName,lv.ContributionValue FROM LiveVedio lv INNER JOIN UserProfile u ON lv.PassportId = u.PassportId WHERE RoomId = @RoomId AND ContributionValue > 0 ORDER BY ContributionValue DESC
UPDATE LiveVedio SET Status = @Status WHERE PassportId = @PassportId
UPDATE LiveVedio SET ContributionValue = @ContributionValue WHERE PassportId = @PassportId AND VedioId = @VedioId
SELECT COUNT(LiveVedioId) FROM LiveVedio WHERE PassportId = @PassportId AND VedioId = @VedioId
UPDATE LiveVedio SET Status = @Status, ViewCount = ViewCount + @ViewCount,LastViewTime = @LastViewTime WHERE PassportId = @PassportId AND VedioId = @VedioId
UPDATE LiveVedio SET Status = 0 WHERE LiveVedioId = @Id
SELECT COUNT(LiveVedioId) FROM LiveVedio WHERE PassportId = @PassportId AND Status = 1
